data.title: Reshmi Ghosh @ Microsoft Research
data.meta_description: Reshmi is an Applied Scientist in the Microsoft AI program under the Office of Applied Research. She focuses her time to understand modern knowledge search behavior, including analyzing knowledge base updates, search motivation, knowledge consumption and dispersion in organizations. In the past year has dedicated her time accelerating the development of intelligent features in Microsoft Loop and Viva.
data.text:

Topic Segmentation in the Wild: Towards Segmentation of Semi-structured & Unstructured Chats
